comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: The Austrian battleship Erzherzog Ferdinand Max was launched in 1905, one of three small battleships of its class- the other two, launched 1902 and 1904, respectively, were named for Erzherzog (Archduke) Karl and Erzherzog Friedrich. Here's a MaritimeQuest page with details about all three ships.
